resources.string: Welcome to Lokalite Mobile! Here you\'ll find a tutorial on the application as well as the background on the company.

Lokalite is a small, Boulder-based, startup company specializing in the distribution of information and advertisements. Lokalite plans to showcase events and organization profiles of local businesses within the community.

 Through Lokalite Mobile! users are able to access an Events List, Organizations List, and their account from the Lokalite server. The Events List and Organizations List is organized into categories and allows for users to search through by various criteria: location, date, and time. Users will be able to map all Events and Organizations with Google Maps. Users will also be able to set notifications (i.e. vibrate or play a sound) which will alert the user of an upcoming Event.
Check out Lokalite\'s website for more details and features!
